meta.description: This file contains the release notes for SunPower Pro Connect

versions.bodyMarkdown:
# Site address display
SunPower Pro Connect will now display the site address in all views in the App after a site is selected. It will be located at the top of each screen.

# Pre-commissioning checklist
With this feature, you will now be reminded of a list of required & suggested items for commissioning. It ensures that you don't forget any important items before you begin commissioning.

# Changes to commissioning successful screen
You will now see a message that "Commissioning was successfully completed" after submitting your configuration successfully. This will indicate to a user that commissioning was completed properly. Previously the screen displayed a message that stated that "Configuration was saved successfully".
